definitions.text: organized opposition to authority; a conflict in which one faction tries to wrest control from another
come into existence; take on form or shape
examples: A new religious movement originated in that country
a love that sprang up from friendship
the idea for the book grew out of a short story
The choirs singing uprose and filled the church
It was a sight to make one's hair uprise!
The audience got up and applauded
The sun uprising sees the dusk night fled...
The smoke arose from the forest fire
The mist uprose from the meadows

definitions.text: get up and out of bed
examples: I get up at 7 A.M. every day
